name: ReferralToPrimaryCareOrAlternateProvider
title: Referral to Primary Care or Alternate Provider
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent referrals to an alternate or primary care provider.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Intervention.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with the different types of services and providers.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
